alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 6:25AM CDT until June 19 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... West central Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 830 AM EDT/730 AM CDT/. * At 725 AM EDT/625 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Webb to near Hartford to 9 miles southwest of Samson, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Cottonwood, Geneva, Marianna, Graceville, Donalsonville, Chipley, Bonifay, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Ashford, Slocomb, Malone, Malvern, Rehobeth, Cottondale, Greenwood, Paxton and Avon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
